name: Magic Vs Magic
description:
Become the greatest spellcaster of them all!

First Spell Caster to reach 10 points wins!

Instructions:

Pink Wizard Controls:

Up Arrow Key

Down Arrow Key

Blue Witch Controls:

W for Up

S for Down

A Pong inspired game.

* Music from https://www.bensound.com

Sound Effects from https://www.zapsplat.com

Art work by Grace Rabbitte

Made with Unity
